messages.msgSnippet: It is August 22-24 in Columbia, SC The website is: www.schoolsoutsupport.org/program.html It looks like it will be really great! ... From: Olga To:
messages.messageBody:
It is August 22-24 in Columbia, SC

The website is: www.schoolsoutsupport.org/program.html

It looks like it will be really great!

----- Original Message -----
From: Olga
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, April 25, 2003 11:28 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling conference?


Hi,

Does any have the dates and specifics of this convention??

Thanks
Olga
